summary: Adds a race to the game, very basic, a Nord in appearance, the stats of a thief or assassin.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b][left]Description:[/left][/b][/size]
This mod adds a race to the game called the Nord Assassin. For all intents and purposes, it's simply a Nord with altered bonuses to fit a thief or assassin playthrough. Skill bonuses aren't incredibly important, but they give a nice boost in the start of the game. I also altered the racial bonuses and a few other stats to fit the assassin/thief a bit better. 

[size=3][b]In-Game Description:[/b][/size]

Most Nords are trained in the way of the warrior, but these specially skilled Nords are masters of stealth. When trained further, they can accomplish a mastery of the shadows. 

[left][size=3][b]Details:[/b][/size]

[size=2][b]Appearance[/b]
[list]
[*][size=2]Nord[/size]
[/list][/size][b]Skill bonuses [/b]
[list]
[*]+10 Sneak
[*]+5 One Handed
[*]+5 Lockpicking
[*]+5 Pickpocket
[*]+5 Archery
[*]+5 Illusion
[*]+5 Light Armor
[/list][b]Specials[/b]
[list]
[*]Removed Battle Cry
[*]Kept 50% frost resist
[*]Added Imperial Special (find more gold)
[/list][b]Other[/b]
[list]
[*]Increased base carry weight by 20
[/list][b]FAQ[/b]
[list]
[*]It is compatible with alt start mods and pretty much everything else. 
[*]Should work fine with any body/texture mods you have
[/list]
[b]Any questions or comments, PM me or comment on the mod :) Happy playing![/b][/left]
author: lavandaashley
